title: Escalation to BUGME
process: Put a Case Macro documenting the request
Ask approval to the following (TL, SME, HD)

fields.label: Offshore ONLY - Escalation to BugMe approved by
fields.description: Your TL should test the issue on desktop and/or mobile devices (according to issue) and confirm if it needs to be escalated. If they find a solution upon testing, they can provide proper steps to follow. Please do not include a Jira Ticket in this section.

fields.label: Current Behavior (Description)
fields.description: Describe the issue with as much detail as possible. Especially important if the previous interaction was a call. If unclear, the issue cannot be reported.

fields.label: Expected Behavior
fields.description: Explain how the app/site should behave if the bug was not present.

fields.label: Steps to Reproduce
fields.description: Outline what steps were taken by TL or the user to trigger the bug. Ex: Went to listing > hit review button > filled out field > hit submit > error.

fields.label: Additional Information
fields.description: Include Device, Platform (mobile app, mobile web, browser, etc.), and App Version.

finalSteps: Provide reason “process sits with other department”
